content: @Reid Barton, after too much fighting I managed to make domineering computational, so it's possible to evaluate small board positions with dec_trivial. I'm happy about this, but very sad about the hoops that I had to jump through to make it happen.
The PR again has some missing proofs (of easy things), as well as some very ugly proofs.
Before I invest any effort in those, could I get you to have a look again and give your opinion on whether the tradeoffs are worth it?
(and now, off to :bed: for me)
